body:
At this years radiance conference there were several artistic images
generated by radiance of things like the turbulence of air in a space -
can someone point me to where these (or similar) images are on the web
please. (I'm giving a lecture to architects and would like to show that
simulation is not just about building performance, but can be used for
conceptual art too.)

Thanks,

Iain
subject: [Radiance-general] simulated art
